title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 58-3.4 - Quarterly payments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 58-3.4 - Quarterly payments

State Regulations

At least quarterly payments must be made. If the laboratory elects to make quarterly payments, equal quarterly payments must be made by June 30th, September 30th, December 31st and March 10th of the State fiscal year to which the billing relates. Nothing herein precludes full payment from being made before these dates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
58-3.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
